## Plots {.tabset}


### Plot 1


```{r, echo = F, warning = F, message = F}

tele <- tele %>% 
  pivot_longer(!Telecoach, names_to = "date", values_to = "count")
  
tele %>% 
  filter(!date %in% c("Total", "Mar-21", "Apr-21", "Jan-21", "Feb-21")) %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(as.numeric(as.character(date)), origin = '1899-12-30')) %>% 
  separate(Telecoach, into = c("Start"), sep = "-") %>% 
  separate(Start, into = "Hour_Start", sep = ":") %>% 
  group_by(Hour_Start) %>% 
  summarise(hourly = sum(count, na.rm = T)) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = as.numeric(Hour_Start), y = hourly), stat = "identity", alpha = .5, color = "black") +
  geom_point(aes(x = as.numeric(Hour_Start), y = hourly)) +
  stat_smooth(aes(x= as.numeric(Hour_Start), y = hourly)) +
  theme(axis.text.x.bottom = element_text(angle = 90)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,23,1)) +
  theme_classic() +
  labs(x = "Hour Start of Call", y = "Frequency", title = "Distribution of TOA for 24Hr Line")


```
